segments.text: Yeah , I ’ Ve been working so much overtime lately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My boss gave me a big project . I had to have it finished it by this morning . It was so difficult !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You shouldn ’ t work so hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But hard work pays off , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe now I ’ ll get that promotion I was hoping for .
segments.speaker: S2
